DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether giving brief motivational interviewing counseling during the prenatal and/or postnatal period(s) will increase utilization of preventive dental care and improve the oral health of rural, low-income pregnant and postpartum women and their children, and to increase the number of home oral health practices taken by these women to prevent caries in their young children.
DOC.criteria: Pregnant (week 26 or earlier) At least 15 years of age Medicaid eligible Speaks English Willing and able to comply with study instructions Mother AND child available for length of the study (~ 24 months)
